forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Becoming windy late. Low 53F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 14C. S winds shifting to WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 57F. S winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 49F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low around 10C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 12C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mostly clear sky. Low 7C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low near 45F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 53F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine early then becoming cloudy later in the day. High 54F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early with showers later at night. Low around 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the evening, then off and on rain showers after midnight. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 12C. Winds ESE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 53F. Winds ESE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 42F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 13C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 54F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and a few passing clouds. High 14C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. High 56F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 6C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 14C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 56F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
